img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9d/Wukong_MiddleHollow_21.jpg)
Once you cross a small bridge, you'll find a much larger home with giant cocoons blocking the doorway. Break them apart, and you'll find a large stove-top in the middle with a **Worryfree Brew** placed on it that you can gain as a new Drink for your Gourd.
img_below_text:
There's also another green Wisp around the back of the house behind more cocoons, but one of the large cocoons behind it hides a Puppet Spider.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/71/Wukong_MiddleHollow_22.jpg)

Once you cross a small bridge, you'll find a much larger home with giant cocoons blocking the doorway. Break them apart, and you'll find a large stove-top in the middle with a **Worryfree Brew** placed on it that you can gain as a new Drink for your Gourd."
        - Following Text: "There's also another green Wisp around the back of the house behind more cocoons, but one of the large cocoons behind it hides a Puppet Spider.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/71/Wukong_MiddleHollow_22.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character approaching a cluster of large cocoons surrounded by webbing in a dark, cavernous area. A green Wisp is visible behind the cocoons, marked with a red circle. This area is described as being behind a house where cocoons block the doorway, and one of the cocoons hides a Puppet Spider. The player is likely exploring this space to interact with the Wisp or uncover hidden elements.
